tool.name: Word Count
tool.description: Counts the words in the input
tool.help:
**What it does**
Produces a chart with the word counts for a document
**Required annotations**
* `Token <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Token.html>`_ (LIF)
**Generated Annotations**
* None
.. class:: infomark
**NOTE**: This tool produces a list of words and their counts from the input document. Can be saved as a file by clicking the file (download) icon in the tool's history window.'
